result.arabic_text: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
result.translation: 41. Barrii kee badal umaané tumbulleh (qabaaraay, biyookaay,) seehadâ gabá abteemih sabbatah, Yalli ken taamoomiy abeenik tul digaalá ken tammoysamkeh addunyal elle akeerak duma, usun woo umaanék Yallal gacaanamkeh.
